resources.string: Please provide a mobile number to Sign up for a Digital Locker account
Every time I am entering username and password, it gives an error "Invalid Username or Password. Try again".
I have forgotten my username. Please tell me how can I retrieve it?
I have forgotten my password. Please tell me how can i retrieve it?
While signing up, I am getting an error message "The mobile number is already registered".Next when i tried to retrieve the Username or password, it is giving me an error"This account is not active".
How can i change my username in DigiLocker
Change your name, description and profile photo
Define what alerts and notification you want to see
Hide your profile from search engines
Change your email/password or delete your account
Digital locker is a platform for assurance and verification of Documents and Certificates in an digital way.Thus, eliminating the use of physical Documents.
With the help of digilocker, citizens can access their digital documents at any time, and anywhere.
These e-documents are more secure and protected than physical documents.
It saves time and is more convenient than other methods.
